basics.name: Fanie Reynders
basics.label: Technical Consultant
basics.summary: For just over a decade, I’ve developed my passion for crafting software, focusing mostly on the Microsoft stack. I’m a dedicated and motivated Microsoft Certified Professional as well as a Microsoft Visual Studio and Development Technologies Most Valued Professional (MVP), who is focused on getting the job done the right way. I absolutely love crafting software and try to push technology to its limits. In my free time I find myself constantly researching, blogging, tweeting, sharing knowledge and speaking at user groups & conferences.

work.summary: Rabobank is one of the biggest banks in The Netherlands and consists of multiple cross functional teams. My role as Senior Developer played an influential role within one of the teams in the Investments sector and was responsible for mainly maintenance development which consisted of new features, stabilization and optimization of the current processes.

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
